amendment.description: To provide for an increase and a decrease in funding for certain programs.

action.text: Proposed amendment SA 2853 withdrawn in Senate.
Amendment SA 2853 proposed by Senator Santorum. (consideration: CR 3/12/2004 S2682-2684) To provide for an increase and a decrease in funding for certain programs.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 2853 proposed by Senator Santorum.
